import React from 'react' import {useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' const CheckoutSection = () => { const location = useLocation(); const isKhmer = location.pathname.startsWith('/kh'); const currentLanguage = location.pathname.split('/')[1] || 'en'; return (
{/* */}
